Contributor: Insurance Press, Inc., printer.; Federation of Women's Foreign Mission Boards of North America, publisher.;
Note: Date based on publisher's date of 1919 for similar posters. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Text says that teachers should enlist now for world fields. Kindergarten to college grade teachers are needed as volunteers for Japan, Korea, China, India, Mexico, and other places. Illustration shows a woman in a graduate robe, holding a diploma, while also touching the shoulders of two Asian children.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Publisher: [New York] : Federation of Woman's Boards of Foreign Missions,

Title: Democracy is not enough - It must be Christian
